annotation: (Requires 2 Science tags. Decrease your energy production 1 step, and increase your titanium production 1 step. Gain 4 titanium.)

div.#text:
(Requires 2 Science tags.
                        dec-energyprod-1 step, and inc-titaniumprod-1 step.
                        Gain 4 titanium.)

annotation: USE A CARD ACTION THAT HAS ALREADY BEEN USED THIS GENERATION

span.#text: USE A CARD ACTION THAT HAS ALREADY BEEN USED THIS GENERATION

annotation: (Action: Spend 2X MC to gain X energy, or decrease energy production 1 step to gain 8 MC.)

div.#text: (Action: Spend 2X MegaCredit to gain X energy, or decrease energyprod-1 step to gain 8 MegaCredit.)

annotation: (Action: Spend any amount of energy to draw the same number of cards. TAKE 1 INTO HAND AND DISCARD THE REST.)

div.#text: (Action: Spend any amount of energy to draw the same number of cards. TAKE 1 INTO HAND AND DISCARD THE REST.)

annotation: (Increase your MC production 1 step per different tag you have in play, including this.)

div.@style: background: linear-gradient(to bottom right, green, yellow, red);

div.#text: (inc-MegaCreditprod-1 step per different tag you have in play, including this.)

annotation: (Steal 3 MC from a player that REMOVED YOUR RESOURCES OR DECREASED YOUR PRODUCTION this generation. Place this card face down in THAT PLAYER'S EVENT PILE.)

div.#text:
(Steal 3 MegaCredit from a player that REMOVED YOUR RESOURCES OR DECREASED YOURprod-this generation.
                        Place this card face down in THAT PLAYER'S EVENT PILE.)

annotation: (Effect: Your titanium resources are worth 1 MC extra.)

div.#text: (Effect: Your titanium resources are worth 1 MegaCredit extra.)

annotation: (Action: Gain 1 MC per Science tag you have.)

div.#text: (Action: Gain 1 MegaCredit per Science tag you have.)

annotation: (Requires that you have 2 Party Leaders. Gain 1 TR.)

div.#text: (Requires that you have 2 Party Leaders. Gain 1 TR.)

annotation: (Effect: Your steel resources are worth 1 MC extra.)

div.#text: (Effect: Your steel resources are worth 1 MegaCredit extra.)

annotation: (Action: Spend 1 floater from here to gain 1 MC for each floater here, INCLUDING THE PAID FLOATER (max 5).)

div.#text: (Action: Spend 1 floater from here to gain 1 MegaCredit for each floater here, INCLUDING THE PAID FLOATER (max 5).)
(Add 1 floater here for every Earth tag you have, including this.)

annotation: (Place a city tile IN SPACE, outside and separate from the planet.)

div.#text: (Place a city tile IN SPACE, outside and separate from the planet.)

annotation: (Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 asteroid resource here and increase MC production 1 step.)

div.#text: (Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 asteroid resource here and increase MegaCreditprod-1 step.)
(1VP for each 2 asteroids on this card.)

annotation: (Effect: When you play a card with basic cost of 20MC or more, increase your MC production 1 step.)

div.#text: (Effect: When you play a card with basic cost of 20MegaCredit or more, inc-MegaCreditprod-1 step.)

annotation: (Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 asteroid resource to ANY CARD or remove 1 asteroid here to place an ocean.)

div.#text: (Action: Spend 1 titanium to add 1 asteroid resource to ANY CARD or remove 1 asteroid here to place an ocean.)

annotation: (REQUIRES THAT A PLAYER REMOVED ANOTHER PLAYER'S PLANTS THIS GENERATION. Gain 1 titanium or 2 steel.)

div.#text: (REQUIRES THAT A PLAYER REMOVED ANOTHER PLAYER'S Plant THIS GENERATION. Gain 1 titanium or 2 steel.)

annotation: (Effect: When playing a card with a requirement, pay 2MC less.)

div.#text: (Effect: When playing a card with a requirement, pay 2MegaCredit less.)

annotation: (Action: Spend 6 MC to add 1 asteroid to ANY CARD (titanium may be used to pay for this), or remove 1 asteroid here to raise temperature 1 step).

div.#text:
(Action: Spend 6 MegaCredit to add 1 asteroid to ANY CARD (titanium may be used to pay for this),
                  or remove 1 asteroid here to raise temperature 1 step).

@class: filterDiv automated buildingTag cityTag powerTag promo
annotation: (Increase your MC production 2 steps, increase your energy production 1 step, gain 3 plants, and place a city tile.)

div.#text: (inc-MegaCreditprod-2 steps, inc-energyprod-1 step, gain 3 Plant, and place a city tile.)

annotation: (Requires 2 power tags. Raise your TR 4 steps.)

div.#text: (Requires 2 power tags. Raise your TR 4 steps.)

annotation: (Action: Spend 5 heat to gain 3 steel.)
(Action: Add a microbe or animal to ANOTHER card.)

div.#text: (Action: Add a microbe or animal to ANOTHER card.)
(Effect: Gain 3 plant. Raise temperature 1 step, and place 1 ocean tile.)

annotation: (Requires that you have 9 different types of resources. Gain 1 TR.)

div.#text: (Requires that you have 9 different types of resources. Gain 1 TR.)

annotation: (Raise your TR 1 step.)
(Effect: When you gain a microbe to ANY CARD, also gain 1MC.)

div.#text: (Effect: When you gain a microbe to ANY CARD, also gain 1MegaCredit.)

@class: filterDiv event promo eventTag spacetag earthTag
annotation: (Gain 4 plants and add 4 microbes to ANOTHER CARD.)

div.#text: (Gain 4 Plant and add 4 microbes to ANOTHER CARD.)

@class: filterDiv active buildingTag spaceTag earthTag promo
annotation: (Action: REVEAL AND DISCARD the top card of the deck. If it has a space tag, add an asteroid here.)

div.#text: (Action: REVEAL AND DISCARD the top card of the deck. If it has a space tag, add an asteroid here.)
OPPONENTS MAY NOT REMOVE YOUR Plant
(dec-energyprod-1 step. 1VP per asteroid on this card.)

@class: filterDiv active buildingTag scienceTag earthTag promo reqs
annotation: (Action: Draw a card.)
(Lose 2 plants. Increase your MC production 2 steps)
(Effect: When you gain an animal to ANY CARD, gain 2MC.)

div.#text: (Effect: When you gain an animal to ANY CARD, gain 2MegaCredit.)

annotation: (Decrease your Energy production 4 steps and increase your Plant production 2 steps. Raise your TR 3 steps.)

div.#text: (dec-Energyprod-4 steps and inc-Plantprod-2 steps. Raise your TR 3 steps. Place this tile.)

annotation: (Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 steel. Remove up to 8 Plants from any player.)

div.#text:
(Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 steel.
                Place this tile ADJACENT TO no other city tile.
                Remove up to 6 Plant from any player.)

@class: filterDiv automated buildingTag powerTag promo reqs
annotation: (Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your Energy production 2 steps.)

div.#text: (Requires 4 oceanTiles. inc-Energyprod-2 steps. Place this tile ADJECENT TO an ocean tile.)

annotation: (Action: Spend 1 MC to add 1 asteroid to ANY card, OR spend 1 asteroid here to raise your MC production 1 step or gain 2 titanium.)

div.#text: (Action: Spend 1 MegaCredit to add 1 asteroid to ANY card, OR spend 1 asteroid here to raise your MegaCreditprod-1 step or gain 2 titanium.)

annotation: (Action: Spend 2 energy to gain 2 plants OR to add 1 animal to ANOTHER card.)

div.#text: (Action: Spend 2 energy to gain 2 Plant OR to add 1 animal to ANOTHER card.)

annotation: (Increase temperature 1 step. Remove up to 2 plants from any player.)

div.#text: (Increase temperature 1 step. Remove up to 2 Plant from any player.)

annotation: (Action: Reveal and place a SPACE OR BUILDING card here from hand, and place 2 resources on it, OR double the resources on a card here. Effect: Cards here may be played as if from hand with its cost reduced by the number of resources on it. Requires 2 Science tags.)

#text: (Action: Reveal and place a SPACE OR BUILDING card here from hand, and place 2 resources on it, OR double the resources on a card here.)
(Effect: Cards here may be played as if from hand with its cost reduced by the number of resources on it.)

annotation: (Requires 2 oceans. Increase your Plant production and your heat production 1 step each.)

div.#text: (Requires 2 Ocean. inc-Plantprod-and your heatprod-1 step each.)

annotation: (Action: Add 1 animal to this card.)

div.#text: (Requires 8 Ocean. 1 VP for each animal on this card.)
